title: Attributions and small samples of data

content.description:
Jose and Maggie are discussing the results of their recent chemistry exam.
Jose: I got a 97% on the test.
Maggie: Congratulations! I did well, too – I got a 95%! I wonder how Brayden did on the test.
Jose: I heard he got a 53% on it, but he had like three tests that day.
Maggie: Well, he’s not the smartest student in our grade. I’m not surprised he got a low score.
content.question: The process that Maggie used to draw a conclusion about Brayden’s intelligence most closely resembles of which the following research methodologies?

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
